William Benton
==============

Mayor
-----

Term Ends: May 2026
[Email William Benton](mailto:wbenton@rosenbergtx.gov)
City Cell: 979-398-9742
Personal Cell: 281-633-1252
City Hall: 832-595-3340

William Benton was first elected to Rosenberg City Council in 2011, was elected Mayor in 2017, re-elected Mayor in May 2019 and again in May 2024.

Mayor Benton is self-employed and the owner of Benton Limousine, ABC Bonding, Benton Realty and Rose-Rich Realty. He earned his Associate’s Degree from Wharton County Junior College and a Bachelor’s Degree from the University of Houston. He is active in several community service organizations including the VFW POST 3903 Auxiliary, Rosenberg Lions Club and Fort Bend County Fair amongst others.
